name: Intervilles Le jeu officiel
overview: All Intervilles in your living room! But be careful, Rosa the cow is not far away and her favorite pastime is to knock down the candidates! The atmosphere of Intervilles in your living room. - Compete against a friend in Intercity challenges: treadmills, foam costumes, water games, turnstiles, etc. - Sharpen your reflexes and control your team with Wiimote and Nunchuk. - Hop on your Wii Balance Board for even more immersion and win your city! - Live the show as if you were there! Compete with a friend, complete 25 challenges from your favorite show to the cheers of the audience. Action, falls and giggles in perspective!
